variables.uiAuthEnv: [if(or(empty(parameters('uiBasicAuthUser')), empty(parameters('uiBasicAuthPassword'))), createArray(), createArray(createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_AUTH_ENABLED', 'value', 'true'), createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_AUTH_TYPE', 'value', 'basic'), createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_AUTH_BASIC_USERNAME', 'value', parameters('uiBasicAuthUser')), createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_AUTH_BASIC_PASSWORD', 'secretRef', 'temporal-ui-password')))]

ingress.customDomains: [if(parameters('enableCustomDomain'), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('customDomainName'), 'certificateId', resourceId('Microsoft.App/managedEnvironments/managedCertificates', parameters('acaEnvName'), format('{0}-{1}-cert', replace(parameters('customDomainName'), '.', '-'), parameters('acaEnvName'))), 'bindingType', 'SniEnabled')), createArray())]

containers.name: temporal-ui
containers.env: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_ADDRESS', 'value', format('{0}.{1}:7233', format('{0}-server', parameters('appName')), parameters('acaEnvName'))), createObject('name', 'TEMPORAL_CORS_ORIGINS', 'value', '*')), variables('uiAuthEnv'))]

metadata.description: ID of the Container Apps Environment.
Name of the Zep container app.
Container registry server for Zep image.
Registry username (optional, if image is private).

variables.zepConfigContent:
[format('store:
  type: postgres
  postgres:
    dsn: "{0}"
llm:
  service: openai
  azure_openai_endpoint: {1}
  azure_openai:
    llm_deployment: {2}
    embedding_deployment: {3}
server:
  host: 0.0.0.0
  port: 8000
  web_enabled: false
log:
  level: debug
auth:
  required: false
', variables('zepDsn'), parameters('azureAiEndpoint'), parameters('azureOpenAiLlmDeployment'), parameters('azureOpenAiEmbeddingDeployment'))]

configuration.secrets: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'zep-postgres-password', 'value', parameters('zepPostgresPassword')), createObject('name', 'zep-config-yaml', 'value', variables('zepConfigContent'))), variables('zepSecret'), variables('azureAiSecret'), variables('zepRegistrySecret'))]
